unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies – Get Your Piece of the Sun!**
normalised: Energy and Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies – Get Your Piece of the Sun!

unnormalised: Hey folks, Diwali's around the corner, and wouldn't it be sweet to light up your home with sunshine – literally? The buzz is all about the renewed push for solar rooftop subsidies, especially in states like Tamil Nadu and Gujarat.
normalised: Hey folks, Diwali's around the corner, and wouldn't it be sweet to light up your home with sunshine – literally? The buzz is all about the renewed push for solar rooftop subsidies, especially in states like Tamil Nadu and Gujarat.

unnormalised: Word on the street is MNRE (Ministry of New and Renewable Energy) is nudging states to streamline the application process, making it easier than ever to get those panels installed. We're talking potential subsidies of up to Rs. 50,000, depending on your roof size and state policies! Imagine all that saved electricity bill money – more biryani for the family, maybe?
normalised: Word on the street is M N R E (Ministry of New and Renewable Energy) is nudging states to streamline the application process, making it easier than ever to get those panels installed. We're talking potential subsidies of up to rupee fifty thousand, depending on your roof size and state policies! Imagine all that saved electricity bill money – more biryani for the family, maybe?

unnormalised: Sources say the Indian Renewable Energy Development Agency (IREDA) is also offering attractive loan options. Don't let this opportunity slip through your fingers! Go green, save some green, and impress your neighbours in your apartment complex in Powai, Mumbai. Seriously, it's a win-win. Get those applications in before the subsidy scheme vanishes faster than ladoos on Diwali! More info available on state government websites, so get clicking!
